title: Shopping: Finding Items (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the Finding Items subcategory within Shopping. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.romaji: Manga wa doko de kaemasu ka?
cards.japanese: 漫画はどこで買えますか？

cards.english: Do you have any dried seaweed at the store?
cards.romaji: Kono omise ni nori ha arimasuka?
cards.japanese: このお店に海苔はありますか？
